name: Casa Magna - Oscuro - Robusto
additionalNotes: Famous tobacco cultivator Nestor Plasencia and renowned master blender Manuel Quesada teamed up to bring avid cigar connoisseurs the Casa Magna Oscuro cigars. A sophisticated blend of aged Honduran and Nicaraguan fillers are covered by a sturdy Honduran binder, all encased in a handsome dark brown Honduran wrapper. These tasty treats are available in four popular big-ring sizes that provide mouthwatering full- body flavors of chocolate, espresso, cream, and a peppery finish. Casa Magna Oscuro cigars exhibit top-notch construction, an even burn, and a smooth draw.
